sourcing.instructions: - Acetic Acid: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: - Acetic Acid: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. In a clean glass container, measure out 30 g of acetic acid.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean glass container, measure out 30 g of acetic acid.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture into a heat-resistant mold.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture into a heat-resistant mold.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool down gradually to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool down gradually to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any rough edges or imperfections.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Inspect the solid sample for any rough edges or imperfections.
